Links.Label: Live Site (View on mobile device for HTML version)

ProjectDetails.Description: Customize a Converse sneaker. This is an adaptive site that delivers a Flash experience for desktop, and HTML for tablet and mobile devices. For this project I was the Tech Team Lead for both the Flash HTML versions. A portion fo the font-end code was forked from the Nike shoe customizer, and adapted with specific features and visuals to accomodate the needs of the Converse brand.
